article.headline: Portland St. 79, Sacramento St. 56
article.story: SACRAMENTO, Calif. (AP)Scott Morrison had 18 points, 11 rebounds and six blocked shots for Portland State in a 79-56 victory over Sacramento State on Saturday night. Jeremiah Dominguez had 20 points and three assists and Deonte Huff added 14 points, six rebounds and four assists for the Vikings (15-8, 8-2), who remain on top of the Big Sky Conference. Jason Davis had 12 points, five rebounds and two steals to lead the Hornets (4-18, 2-9). The Vikings opened up the second half with a 20-2 run to lead 60-30 with 13:15 remaining. The Hornets didn't hit their first shot from the floor until Justin Eller made a lay up at the 12:42 mark. Portland State had its biggest lead at 70-34 after Dominguez made a 3-pointer with 10 minutes left to play. After Huff's basket completed a 16-2 run, the Vikings lead 31-17 with less than six minutes left in the first half. Portland State led by as many as 17 points on its way to a 40-28 halftime lead.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
